title: Cherry Blossom Moon
description: Jenny's friend Allison has a deep, dark secret. Her grandfather vanished mysteriously in the 1950s and the government insisted he was a spy. Jenny knows she can help Allison find out the truth--but she'll need the help of "The Anywhere Ring" to do it. From the author of A Whole Summer of Weird Susan and The Double Fudge Dare.
author: Louise Ladd
